ygData.messageBody:
Look waaaaay down for my comment

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 11:18 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*

From: John Robertson <johnr@...>

*spoiler*













chlebek@... wrote:

> > like Shada talk about a purity belt. What is it,
> > how much is it, and where can I get one?
> >
> > Weiland the Extremely Poor Bard of Freeport
> > Erollisi Marr
>
> The purity belts are AC3, +2 STR, +2 STA. They usually
sell for anywhere from
> 5pp to 10pp. They are found on the island of the Sisters
of Erollisi. On this
> island are warriors just named "a sister of erollisi" that
carry a rusty halberd
> and a purity belt.

The information above is correct. My gnome necromancer has
sold MANY MANY of

One thing to note, killing sisters is bad for your wood elf
faction. It's something like this:

Crushbone orcs better

Yes, that's right, your faction with CB orcs goes UP.


I think I looted one off an Orc and it very well could have been in CB.
Probably a much more rare drop in CB than OOT

Sylly.
